definition: person of the same profession/of the same trade, occupation or industry
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to walk hand in hand/to cooperate

sentences.english: You may wonder how many of his peers would agree with him.
sentences.chinese: 你或許會好奇他的同行中有幾個人贊同他的觀點。

sentences.english: This paper can serve as the reference for the mills to select the board machine.
sentences.chinese: 本文試述紙板成形器的選用與發展趨勢，供同行參考。

sentences.english: And so she released him to be with those who resonated with his path.
sentences.chinese: 所以她放下了他，讓他和那些與他道路共振的人同行。

sentences.english: You leave me to go to glory; my sad heart will follow you everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 我這碎了的心，將隨時隨地與你同行。

sentences.english: With him went the noble levy and the private magnate armies.
sentences.chinese: 徵募的貴族民團和權貴的私軍與他同行。

sentences.english: Come, let us go down together.
sentences.chinese: 來吧，我們同行，順流而下。

sentences.english: The company's technology and quality are in the same industry-leading level.
sentences.chinese: 本公司的技術及質量都處於同行業中的領先水平。

sentences.english: The paper provides the concrete method combining work to discuss.
sentences.chinese: 本文結合工作實踐，提出具體操作方法，與同行共榷。

sentences.english: We got to know some of our fellow passengers, too.
sentences.chinese: 我們也開始認識了一些同行的旅客。

sentences.english: Madam Zou, the Executive Director has been with us on this visit. She always provides good consultancy and advice.
sentences.chinese: 鄒執董和我們一路同行，她總是提出好的意見建議。

sentences.english: Walk with a friend or group of friends.
That the publication be widely read by their peers within the discipline.
sentences.chinese: 那就是出版物能夠被學科領域內的同行廣泛閱讀。

sentences.english: Quality certificates shall go along with the goods.
sentences.chinese: 質量證明書應隨貨同行。

sentences.english: Non American Express Cardmember companion surcharge $400 per person.
sentences.chinese: 非美國運通卡會員人士同行附加費每位$400。

sentences.english: Suddenly, there was a voice, "Come, Love, I will take you.
sentences.chinese: 突然，傳來一個聲音“來吧，愛情，我將攜你同行。”

sentences.english: Everyone in the trade knows that US’s bristles are of superior quality to those from other countries.
sentences.chinese: 同行中人人皆知美國豬鬃質地優於其他國家的供貨。

definition: on the road/on a journey/road surface
to go with sb/to form companionships
Tongren county in Huangnan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 黃南藏族自治州|黄南藏族自治州[Huang2 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
close friend/pal/(social networking website) friend/CL:個|个[ge4]
